title: [Whistler's Pass]
description: Partially obscured by the darkness, a beleaguered thorn bush squats amidst a pile of broken shale.  Its tentacle-like branches are bare of fruit, their precious bounty having been stolen by the stealthy denizens of the pass.

Partially obscured by heavy shadows, a beleaguered thorn bush squats amidst a pile of broken shale.  Its tentacle-like branches are bare of fruit, their precious bounty having been stolen by the stealthy denizens of the pass.
